com.complexible.common.memory

Interface ExtendedObjectSerializer<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ObjectSerializer<T>

    public interface ExtendedObjectSerializer<T>
extends ObjectSerializer<T>
    A small extension to ObjectSerializer which helps to serialize objects to ByteWriters and read from ByteReaders.
    Since:
    4.1
    Version:
    4.1
    Author:
    Pavel Klinov

    • Method Summary

      void write(T theObj, com.complexible.common.io.ByteWriter theWriter) 
      default void write(T theObj, LongByteBuffer theBuf)
